entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle beginning after midnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
